intro:
Introducing Spot The Difference Anime Edition, brought to you by the original creators of the globally renowned Spot The Difference amusement machine game. Now, with an added twist: a thrilling two-player mode that allows you to compete head-to-head against anyone, anytime.

Embark on an exhilarating journey through the Anime world of Spot The Difference. Retaining the same captivating gameplay as the beloved original, this edition challenges your keen eyes and rapid thinking to spot all the differences before your opponent does. Whether you're facing off against a friend or racing against the clock in single-player mode, prepare for an immersive experience that tests your observation skills to the limit.
